actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005

summary.text: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005 [sic]- Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.

titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
